description: Working as a Fullstack developer on global real estate software and websites where a mixture of old and new technologies are integrated such as classic ASP to Angular or VB6 to C# .NET
Working to develop and fix features requested by clients to both improve and maintain the application

Developing Logos, Mock Ups, Wireframes, and Color Palettes to give client expectations
Showcasing Demos of any functionality or design to ensure client satisfaction

Implemented informational website that scraped data from an API and was parsed through Json with PHP as the backend and Bootstrap/JQuery on the frontend
Implemented an Android Application natively with Java and XML, PHP was used for the backend/database communication
